QuestData.Title: The Doomstone
QuestData.Description: At the core of Animus is an artifact known as the Doomstone. One of its properties is an ability to absorb a great deal of energy.$B$BThis is how the cultists are trying to set off the explosion... by overloading the stone and amplifying the power through the elemental.$B$BBring me the Doomstone. For safe keeping, of course.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He has the Doomstone within him!
QuestData.RewardText: Surprising... you lived.$B$BI thank you for doing my dirty work, $c. You kept my hands clean while ridding me of some incompetent Grimtotem leaders.$B$BNot only do I have the Rattle of Bones, the Writ of History, and the Drums of War, but I now have the ultimate artifact: the Doomstone!
